post.text:
Join us LIVE at 6:30pmE! Our nightly campaign coverage from Trump Tower!

This is a HISTORIC movement. Together, we will once again make a government by, for, and of the people! Help us close out the final weeks of this campaign strong and WIN.
Contribute $10 Now >> www.DonaldJTrump.com/Live

comment.author: Joseph
comment.text: Obamacare cheapest plan $600 month, $13K deductible. Who the hell can afford that!?!?

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: They think the middle class can pay that AND carry everyone else who cannot!

replies.author: Michael
replies.text: Middle class is barely staying afloat! Cannot hang on much longer. Something's got to give! If Clinton wins, middle class is destined to become a forgotten class. Only the rich and poor. We've been hanging on by our fingernails. Everything keeps going up, but income is stagnant. Hope Trump has an answer for this.
